name: fontzoom.vim
description:
*fontzoom* is a Vim plugin to control gui fontsize.  You can change fontsize
with + and - keys(when default setting).  You can also use the [count].
This plugin remember 'guifont', 'lines', and 'columns' when you change
fontsize first.  And tries to keep the size of the window as much as possible.

similar plugins:
guifont++.vim        http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=593
zoom.vim        http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2321
fontsize.vim        http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2809

Latest Version:
http://github.com/thinca/vim-fontzoom
